message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take the majority, but I'll be generous!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet!
Getting closer to the edge, Bob!
I'm getting greedy, Alice! You'd better meet me here!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me halfway!
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my best offer!
This is it, Bob. My final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not backing down now!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it, or we'll both lose everything.
I'll take it all, Alice. You've left me no choice!
